principles: Warm neutral palette for eye comfort

card.default: bg-[var(--tekton-bg-surface)] border border-[var(--tekton-border-default)] rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md hover:border-[var(--tekton-border-emphasis)] transition-all

button.primary: bg-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] text-[var(--tekton-bg-surface)] hover:bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas-950,#0a0a0a)] rounded-lg h-10 px-4 text-sm font-medium transition-colors
button.secondary: bg-[var(--tekton-bg-surface)] text-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] border border-[var(--tekton-border-default)] hover:bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] rounded-lg h-10 px-4 text-sm font-medium transition-colors
button.ghost: text-[var(--tekton-text-secondary)] hover:bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] hover:text-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] rounded-lg h-10 px-4 text-sm font-medium transition-colors
button.icon: text-[var(--tekton-text-secondary)] hover:text-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] hover:bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] rounded-md p-2 transition-colors

input.default: w-full bg-[var(--tekton-bg-surface)] border border-[var(--tekton-border-default)] rounded-lg h-10 px-3 text-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] placeholder:text-[var(--tekton-text-tertiary)] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] focus:border-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] transition-all
input.search: w-full bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] border-none rounded-lg h-10 px-10 text-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] placeholder:text-[var(--tekton-text-secondary)] focus:bg-[var(--tekton-bg-surface)] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] transition-all

badge.neutral: inline-flex items-center rounded-md bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-[var(--tekton-text-secondary)]
badge.brand: inline-flex items-center rounded-md bg-[var(--tekton-bg-brand-subtle)] px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-[var(--tekton-text-link)]

avatar.root: relative inline-flex h-10 w-10 shrink-0 overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)]
avatar.fallback: flex h-full w-full items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] text-sm font-medium text-[var(--tekton-text-secondary)]

menu.item: flex w-full items-center rounded-md px-2 py-2 text-sm text-[var(--tekton-text-primary)] hover:bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] cursor-pointer

layout.sidebar: w-64 border-r border-[var(--tekton-border-default)] bg-[var(--tekton-bg-canvas)] h-screen p-4 flex flex-col

fontFamily.mono: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, monospace
